flawed_nl_solution:
Traveling at 50 yards per minute, Biff can travel 500 yards in 500/50=<<500/50=10>>10 minutes.
In 10 minutes, traveling at 51 yards per minute, Kenneth can travel 10*51=<<10*51=501>>501 yards.
Thus, Kenneth will be 501-500=<<501-500=1>>1 yards past the finish line when Biff crosses the finish line.
#### 1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 510, not 501. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
